definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shine (acc. to Thes al.= II. [[הלל]] (splenduit, from sonuit acute, clare, so Thes; these mngs., however, merely assumed); but v. Lag:Or. ii. 19 & sub foll.; cf. Ar. hal=a begin to shine, hila0lun new moon; As. êllu, bright COT:Gloss)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: only Inf. sf. [[בְּהִלּוֹ נֵרוֹ עֲלֵי ראׂשִׁי]] Job 29:3 when it, viz. his lamp, shone upon my head (cf. Ew:§ 309 c), fig. of God's favour.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇהֵל]] Job 31:26, 3 fs. [[תָּהֶל]] Job 41:10; 3 mpl. [[יׇהֵ֫לּוּ]] Is 13:10; —flash forth light, of heavenly bodies, [[אוֹר]] = sun Job 31:26 (‖[[יׇרֵחַ יׇקָר הׂלֵח]]); sq. acc. cogn. [[בּוֹכְבֵי הַשָּׁמַיִם וּכְּ סִילֵיהֶם אָׁ יׇהֵלּוּ אוֹרָם]] Is 13:10 (‖[[חָשַׁח הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ]], & [[יׇרֵחַ לאׁ־יַגִּיהּ אוֹרוֹ]]); also of crocodile [[עֲטִישׁׂתָיו תָּ֫הֶל אוֹר]] Job 41:10 his sneezings flash forth light (shining water-drops).
